trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SEQ_00<tab>The wounded Resistance fighter has a lot on his mind.
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the bloody bandana to the Resistance fighter's mother in Ala Gannha.
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_000<tab>There is something I would ask of you, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_001<tab>I joined the Resistance against my mother's wishes. She awaits me back in my hometown.
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_002<tab>I'm lucky to still be here after that last battle and I don't want to take her love for granted anymore.
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_003<tab>Please, deliver this bandana to Mother in Ala Gannha on my behalf.
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_004<tab>And tell her that I said “Thank you.” I want her to know I understand why she objected to me joining the fight against the Empire.
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_INJURED02652_000_005<tab>Please, deliver this bandana to Mother in Ala Gannha on my behalf. And tell her of my gratitude.
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_011<tab>Wh-Why, this is my boy's! Has something happened to him!?

TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_012<tab>Thank heavens. He is still safe. I tried to dissuade him from joining the Resistance, but he would not listen. We had a big fight and he wound up sneaking out in the dead of night.

TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_013<tab>It is a weight off my mind to learn that he does not resent me. However, the fact he has returned this bandana must mean he intends to continue fighting.
TEXT_STMBDZ102_02652_SURVIVINGFAMILY02652_000_014<tab>If his resolve is truly that strong then there is little chance of me convincing him to come home. I will continue to pray for his safe return.
